title: Fall Kickoff & Reading Session
excerpt: Start the semester with scores & snacks!
description: Bring a pencil, your ACDA card, and a friend. We\u2019ll read new literature and outline the semester.

title: Vocal Health Clinic

description: Practical tips from a speech-language pathologist. Q&A at the end.

title: Community Service Sing
description: We\u2019ll share short pieces in the community and invite passersby to join a round.
